Title: Pepper McMasters Singles Seminar
Plot: The Party Down team caters a senior singles mixer hosted by Pepper McMasters. Constance has an awkward encounter with an old flame and Casey seeks relationship advice.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Offensive language,drug use and sexual themes
GuestStars: Ed Begley Jr., , Marilu Henner, Olivia Alaina May, Traber Burns
